ThingDef.label: animal bionic eye
ThingDef.description: Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities. Fits all kinds of animals except megascarabs.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic animal arm
ThingDef.description: Simple but durable arm prosthesis. Fits monkeys.

ThingDef.label: bionic animal arm
ThingDef.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user. Fits monkeys.

ThingDef.label: simple prosthetic animal leg (small)
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthesis made to replace missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient. Fits boorats, chickens, chinchillas, cobras, hares, iguanas, megascarabs, monkeys, squirrels, tortoises and yorkshire terriers.
